thread.section_title: The Spain Event opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre The Spain Event | www.thespainevent.com
thread.title: Mrs Dianne Williams
thread.title_full: The Spain Event evaluado por Mrs Dianne Williams

author: Mrs Dianne Williams
title: Mrs Dianne Williams
text: just come home from a 50th birthday in madrid and Aaron organised lots for us . there was 25 of us and a mix of ages so didn't know where to start but he came up with the goods and it was a fantastic weekend.. he sorted airport transfer and the driver was brilliant, tapas tour on the first night..and on the birthday itself we had a tablet tour which was fantastic fun and brilliantly organised then beer bikes (we had 2) and 2 hilarious drivers that kept us going, we were all left breathless after so much laughing lol ..oh and the pedaling... then Aaron had sorted a place to go for lunch and even a birthday cake...the huge icing on the cake was our guide Sukie, she was fantastic, nothing was too much trouble for her and she even came to join us when she didn't have too. she started as our guide but she soon became one of us. can't praise her enough. miss her.. miss madrid.. and thank you Aaron. fab job done
